description: Irregular triangle read by rows: Let k encode the edges of an n-vertex graph by taking edges (u,v), with u < v, in lexicographic order ((0,1), ..., (0,n-1), (1,2), ..., (1,n-1), ..., (n-1,n)) and adding each edge to the graph if the corresponding binary digit of k (starting with the least significant digit) is 1. T(n,k) is the smallest nonnegative integer that encodes the same unlabeled n-vertex graph as k, 0 <= k < n*(n-1)/2.
